items.sentence: I sure never thought Tom would do something like that.
I\'m afraid I can\'t make myself understood in French.
That must\'ve happened while Tom and I were in Boston.
Your suggestion that we should help Tom is a good one.
Tom certainly let me know what he thought of my ideas.
You won\'t get another chance to do that anytime soon.
She has made up her mind to go to the States to study.
She has started to get a few wrinkles around her eyes.
I was surprised to see Tom\'s car in Mary\'s driveway.
Tom was sentenced to three weeks of community service.
